Job Description: Job Title : Senior Engineer (Amazon Connect)Job Location : Bangalore   Exp : 3 to 6 yrs** Need decent communication skillsJob Requirements :Must have experience in delivering Lambda functions, especially in context of external service integrations  - Experienced IVR developer with 1+ years Amazon connect experience   - Should have experience building both contact and chat flows in AWS connect   - 1+ years of IT Experience in customer service technologies including contact center cloud based products,     solution design and implementation.  - Experience building integrations across WFM, CRM, Unified Communications, and contact center solutions - Working knowledge of popular communications protocols and APIs such as WebRTC and SIP - 1+ years of customer-facing experience, preferably in the enterprise space - Experience developing solutions and passion for getting hands dirty with code/scripting     (e.g., python, java, c#, .NET, Node.js)     RequirementsExp in IVR development     Benefits As per company norms
